Question: In August, after reportedly finishing chemotherapy, this person told his family he wished to die at home.
Hints: In February 1954, this person appeared in a screen test with James Dean, directed by Gjon Mili, for East of Eden (1955).
This person's spokesman told the press that the star was "doing nicely," but neither confirmed nor denied that he had cancer.
This person showed an early interest in the theater, which his mother encouraged.
